survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Eco-Friendly Household Cleaning Products Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors related to eco-friendly household cleaning products to help businesses tailor their offerings and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase eco-friendly household cleaning products?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure frequency. Ensure options are clear and mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase eco-friendly household cleaning products?

questions.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing eco-friendly cleaning products? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse priorities. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when choosing eco-friendly cleaning products? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when purchasing eco-friendly cleaning products?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Limit response to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when purchasing eco-friendly cleaning products?

questions.question_text: Where do you typically purchase eco-friendly cleaning products?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Always' to Q1.
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' option with text input for specificity. Randomize option order.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Where do you typically purchase eco-friendly cleaning products?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Occasionally', 'Frequently', or 'Always' to Q1.

questions.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for eco-friendly cleaning products compared to conventional ones?
questions.client_notes: Use clear percentage ranges to quantify willingness to pay. Ensure options are exhaustive.

script.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for eco-friendly cleaning products compared to conventional ones?
